title: Dr. B: the website to go to for extra vaccines
description:
Covid vaccines have a short shelf life -- just six hours after getting thawed -- and some vaccine sites are reporting extras they have to throw away at the end of the day. How the founder of ZocDoc is now helping connect people with leftover vaccines with a new website called Dr. B.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
